purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the association between an original product definition and a planned product definition. The planned product definition is based upon the original definition.

inscope.li: identifies view dependent association between an original product definition and a planned product definition;
identifies deletion of an original design object;
identifies addition of a planned design object;
identifies change of an original design object with a planned design object;
identifies assignment of an association between an original product definition and a planned product definition to or ;
